name: CfP (Extended Deadline - April 20, 2024): BROLLY. Journal of Social Sciences
content: EXTENDED DEADLINE CfP: BROLLY. Journal of Social Sciences â€“ NEW SERIES (London, UK) Vol. 5, No. 1, April 2024 (General Topic) Submission Deadline: April 20, 2024 ISSN 2516-869X (Print) ISSN 2516-8703 (Online) No processing or publication fees. Open Access Web: https://www.journals.lapub.co.uk/index.php/Brolly Email: brolly@journals.lapub.co.uk BROLLY welcomes submissions of original papers that make contributions to the research field of humanities, pursuing the changes that occur in the contemporary world. The journal publishes each issue a selection of articles in the areas of philosophy, sociology, political sciences, ethics, education, semiotics, psychology, communication and cultural studies.
